idsDocument.name: PayerClaim
idsDocument.elementOrder: ClaimId, DataBatchSource, PersistentTransactionId, AdjustmentTransactionId, ExternalTransactionId, OtherClaimId, Member, PayerClient, PayToProvider, ReferringProvider, ProviderNetworkArrangementCode, ProviderOutOfStateIndicator, Payer, AdjustedCode, TypeCode, InputMethodCode, ExplanationCode, ExplanationText, BillingFrequencyCode, BillingClassCode, BillingFacilityQualifier, StartServiceFromDate, LatestServiceThruDate, ReceivedDate, PaidDate, PayeeTypeCode, ClientSegment, ProductPlanClassCategoryCode, ClientCoverageClassId, ClassPlanId, ClientPlanEffectiveDate, ProviderNetworkCode, CapitationCode, AllCapitatedServicesCode, AccidentCode, AccidentDate, COBRAIndicator, COBTypeCode, COBEOBSubmitIndicator, AssociationMemberCode, AssociationMemberNumber, PCPIndicator, CurrencyCode, NetAllowedAmount, NetChargeAmount, NetCOBPaidAmount, NetCoinsuranceAmount, NetCopayAmount, NetDeductibleAmount, NetHRAPaidAmount, NetPaidAmount, TotalAllowedAmount, TotalChargeAmount, TotalCOBPaidAmount, TotalCoinsuranceAmount, TotalCoPayAmount, TotalDeductibleAmount, TotalHRAPaidAmount, TotalPaidAmount, AdmissionTypeCode, AdmissionSourceCode, AdmissionDate, DischargeDate, DischargeStatusCode, MSDRGCode, CMSDRGCode, APRDRGCode, DRGQualifierCode, PaidDRGCode, PaperEOBCode, CoveredDays, NonCoveredDays, ClaimDiagnoses, ClaimProcedures, ClaimLineItems

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: OmniStatus, OmniStatusReason, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsDocument.documentation: This represents the header level for a claim for coverage of medical service in the context of hospital services, medical office visits and professional services, prescriptions, dental and vision care.

element.name: DataBatchSource
element.documentation: Source organization/system/feed for this claim record

element.name: ClaimId
element.documentation: Unique ID for the claim transaction.

element.name: PersistentTransactionId
element.documentation: The transaction identifier used to identify the claim header. This will be the same for the original claim and all associated adjustments

element.name: AdjustmentTransactionId
element.documentation: The adjusted claim transaction identifier when a claim change is made. This will always be unique.

element.name: ExternalTransactionId
element.documentation: Transaction identifier as represented in the external source

element.name: OtherClaimId
element.documentation: Alternative claim identifier for use in additional integration scenarios.

element.name: Member
element.documentation: Use this element to link this claim to the Member that received health care services.

element.name: PayToProvider
element.documentation: Use this element to link this claim to the Health Care Provider to whom payment should be made.

element.name: ReferringProvider
element.documentation: Use this element to link this claim to the Referring Health Care Provider.

element.name: ProviderNetworkArrangementCode
element.documentation: Identifies the product / plan agreement for this provider under which this claim was adjudicated. This column can be used to identify in which products a provider is or has been a participating provider.

element.name: ProviderOutOfStateIndicator
element.documentation: Code indicating if provider is out of state with respect to the health plan product.

element.name: AdjustedCode
element.documentation: Indicator as to whether this record represents the original claim or an adjustment to the original claim

element.name: TypeCode
element.documentation: Use this element to specify the type of type of claim. This could be a provider professional services claim, a hospital/institutional claim, a pharmacy claim, dental claim, vision claim, etc..

element.name: InputMethodCode
element.documentation: A code to indicate if the claim entry was on-line or electronic in the originating system

element.name: ExplanationCode
element.documentation: Code associated with text that would typically appear in an Explanation of Benefits (EOB) for this claim

element.name: ExplanationText
element.documentation: Text that would typically appear in an Explanation of Benefits (EOB) for this claim

element.name: BillingFrequencyCode
element.documentation: This specifiesg the frequency of the claim. It corresponds to the third position of the Uniform Billing Claim Form: Claim Frequency Type Code

element.name: BillingClassCode
element.documentation: Code representing the Billing Class Code. Taken from the Uniform Billing Bill Type.

element.name: BillingFacilityQualifier
element.documentation: Code representing the Facility Code Qualifier. Taken from the Uniform Billing Bill Type.

element.name: StartServiceFromDate
element.documentation: Earliest date of service for this claim

element.name: LatestServiceThruDate
element.documentation: Latest date of service for this claim

element.name: ReceivedDate
element.documentation: Date the clain was received

element.name: PaidDate
element.documentation: Date the claim was paid

element.name: PayeeTypeCode
element.documentation: Code to describe who the payee is. This could be the Provider, Member, Subscriber, etc.

element.name: ClientSegment
element.documentation: Use this element to link this claim to a sub-group of the Client

element.name: ProductPlanClassCategoryCode
element.documentation: Code representing the plan class of the product

element.name: ClientCoverageClassId
element.documentation: Client specific ID for the plan

element.name: ClassPlanId
element.documentation: Unique identifier for the plan class

element.name: ClientPlanEffectiveDate
element.documentation: The beginning date supplied by the source that designates when a given set of data was valid for usage.

element.name: ProviderNetworkCode
element.documentation: Code describing whether the Provider is in or out of network

element.name: CapitationCode
element.documentation: Indicates if this claim is for a capitation fee, which is a flat fee per patient seen, as opposed to based on service rendered.

element.name: AllCapitatedServicesCode
element.documentation: Indicates if this claim is for a capitation fee, which is a flat fee per patient seen, as opposed to based on service rendered.

element.name: AccidentCode
element.documentation: Code used to identify the claim as an accident or emergency illness.

element.name: AccidentDate
element.documentation: The date of the accident or onset of emergency illness as identified

element.name: COBRAIndicator
element.documentation: Code to indicate whether the claim is covered by COBRA eligibility

element.name: COBTypeCode
element.documentation: Code describing the type of coordination of benefits in effect, if any

element.name: COBEOBSubmitIndicator
element.documentation: Indicates if an Explanation of Benefits statement from another carrier was submitted with the claim.

element.name: AssociationMemberCode
element.documentation: Code indicating that claim is for a member of a larger association to which the Payer belongs, such as BlueCard members of the BC/BS association.

element.name: AssociationMemberNumber
element.documentation: If claim is for a member of a larger payer association, this is the member number

element.name: PCPIndicator
element.documentation: Indicates that the claim is for services rendered by the member's the primary care provider

element.name: CurrencyCode
element.documentation: The monetary unit in which all Amounts in the Claim are denominated.

element.name: NetAllowedAmount
element.documentation: Net allowed amount for this claim

element.name: NetChargeAmount
element.documentation: Net charge amount for this claim

element.name: NetCOBPaidAmount
element.documentation: Net COB paid amount from another carrier for this claim

element.name: NetCoinsuranceAmount
element.documentation: Net coinsurance amount for this claim

element.name: NetCopayAmount
element.documentation: Net copay amount for this claim

element.name: NetDeductibleAmount
element.documentation: Net deductible amount for this claim

element.name: NetHRAPaidAmount
element.documentation: Net HRA paid amount for this claim

element.name: NetPaidAmount
element.documentation: Net paid amount for this claim

element.name: TotalAllowedAmount
element.documentation: Total allowed amount for this claim

element.name: TotalChargeAmount
element.documentation: Total charge amount for this claim

element.name: TotalCOBPaidAmount
element.documentation: Total cob paid amount for this claim

element.name: TotalCoinsuranceAmount
element.documentation: Total coinsurance amount for this claim

element.name: TotalCoPayAmount
element.documentation: Total copay amount for this claim

element.name: TotalDeductibleAmount
element.documentation: Total deductible amount for this claim

element.name: TotalHRAPaidAmount
element.documentation: Total hra paid amount for this claim

element.name: TotalPaidAmount
element.documentation: Total paid amount for this claim

element.name: AdmissionTypeCode
element.documentation: Code representing the admission type. This would apply only to hospital/institutional claims

element.name: AdmissionSourceCode
element.documentation: Code representing the admission source. This would apply only to hospital/institutional claims

element.name: AdmissionDate
element.documentation: Date of admission. This would apply only to hospital/ institutional claims

element.name: DischargeDate
element.documentation: Date of discharge. This would apply only to hospital/ institutional claims

element.name: PayerClient
element.documentation: Use this element to link this claim to the client, which represents the payer customer under which the member belongs

element.name: Payer
element.documentation: Use this element to link to the Payer

element.name: DischargeStatusCode
element.documentation: Code representing the discharge status. This would apply only to hospital/institutional claims

element.name: MSDRGCode
element.documentation: Code representing the MS-DRG. This would apply only to hospital/institutional claims

element.name: CMSDRGCode
element.documentation: Code representing the CMS-DRG. This would apply only to hospital/institutional claims

element.name: APRDRGCode
element.documentation: Code representing the APR-DRG. This would apply only to hospital/institutional claims

element.name: DRGQualifierCode
element.documentation: Code representing the DRG qualifier. This would apply only to hospital/institutional claims

element.name: PaidDRGCode
element.documentation: Code representing the DRG code for which payment was made. This would apply only to hospital/institutional claims

element.name: PaperEOBCode
element.documentation: Code representing the discharge status. This would apply only to hospital/institutional claims

element.name: CoveredDays
element.documentation: Number of days of a hospital stay covered for this claim. This would apply only to hospital/institutional claims.

element.name: NonCoveredDays
element.documentation: Number of days of a hospital stay that are not covered for this claim. This would apply only to hospital/institutional claims.

list.name: ClaimDiagnoses
list.documentation: Use this collection to specify the list diagnoses associated with the Claim.

idsDocument.name: PayerClaimDiagnosis
idsDocument.elementOrder: DiagnosisEvent, SequenceNbr, ICD9DecimalDiagnosisCode, ICD9NonDecimalDiagnosisCode, ICD10DiagnosisCode, SNOMEDCTDiagnosisCode, OtherDiagnosisCodes, QualifierCodes, TypeCode, PresentOnAdmissionCode

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: OmniStatus, OmniStatusReason, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsDocument.documentation: Data about the diagnosis associated with the Claim

element.name: SourceName
element.documentation: This element must identify the source system that was responsible for generating this data. This value is determined by the integration team and used in combination with SourceInstanceId will allow this record to be traced back to its originating source.

element.name: SourceInstanceId
element.documentation: This element must contain an integration manufactured value that uniquely identifies the collection element and can be used to map back to the source system. Whatever value is manufactured must not change over time as it will be used to make updates when data changes in the source system.

element.name: DiagnosisEvent
element.documentation: Link to associated DiagnosisEvent in the clinical domain

element.name: SequenceNbr
element.documentation: Number representing the order of this diagnosis in the list of procedures for this claim.

element.name: DiagnosisCode
element.documentation: Depicts the diagnosed condition based on the standardized diagnosis code value set used in the health system (ICD-9, ICD-10).

element.name: ICD9DecimalDiagnosisCode
element.documentation: Diagnosis code expressed as an ICD-9 code with decimal point.

element.name: ICD9NonDecimalDiagnosisCode
element.documentation: Diagnosis code expressed as an ICD-9 code without a decimal point..

element.name: ICD10DiagnosisCode
element.documentation: Diagnosis code expressed as an ICD-10 code.

element.name: SNOMEDCTDiagnosisCode
element.documentation: Diagnosis code expressed as a SNOMED CT code.

element.name: OtherDiagnosisCodes
element.documentation: Diagnosis code(s) expressed in a coding system that is proprietary to the implementation environment.

element.name: QualifierCodes
element.documentation: Diagnosis qualifier codes

element.name: TypeCode
element.documentation: Indicates primary, secondary or other categorizations of the diagnosis code

element.name: PresentOnAdmissionCode
element.documentation: Indicates (Y/N) whether the diagnosis was present on admission for an inpatient claim

list.name: ClaimProcedures
list.documentation: Use this collection to specify the list of Procedures associated with the Claim

idsDocument.name: PayerClaimProcedure
idsDocument.elementOrder: ProcedureEvent, SequenceNbr, CPT4ProcedureCode, CDTProcedureCode, HCPCSProcedureCode, ICD9DecimalProcedureCode, ICD9NonDecimalProcedureCode, ICD10PCSProcedureCode, SNOMEDCTProcedureCode, OtherProcedureCodes, ProcedureDate, ProcedureModifierCodes

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: OmniStatus, OmniStatusReason, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsDocument.documentation: Data about the procedure associated with the claim

element.name: SourceName
element.documentation: This element must identify the source system that was responsible for generating this data. This value is determined by the integration team and used in combination with SourceInstanceId will allow this record to be traced back to its originating source.

element.name: SourceInstanceId
element.documentation: This element must contain an integration manufactured value that uniquely identifies the collection element and can be used to map back to the source system. Whatever value is manufactured must not change over time as it will be used to make updates when data changes in the source system.

element.name: ProcedureEvent
element.documentation: Link to a ProcedureEvent record. This would be populated in lieu of the subsequent fields if clinical events are being implemented in the environment.

element.name: SequenceNbr
element.documentation: Number representing the order of this procedure in the list of procedures for this claim.

element.name: CPT4ProcedureCode
element.documentation: Procedure code expressed as a CPT-4 code.

element.name: CDTProcedureCode
element.documentation: Procedure code expressed as a CDT code.

element.name: HCPCSProcedureCode
element.documentation: Procedure code expressed as a HCPCS code.

element.name: ICD9DecimalProcedureCode
element.documentation: Procedure code expressed as an ICD-9 code with decimal point.

element.name: ICD9NonDecimalProcedureCode
element.documentation: Procedure code expressed as an ICD-9 code without a decimal point.

element.name: ICD10PCSProcedureCode
element.documentation: Procedure code expressed as an ICD-10-PCS code.

element.name: SNOMEDCTProcedureCode
element.documentation: Procedure code expressed as a SNOMED code.

element.name: OtherProcedureCodes
element.documentation: Procedure code expressed in a custom or proprietary code set.

element.name: ProcedureModifierCodes
element.documentation: List of procedure modifier codes

element.name: ProcedureDate
element.documentation: Date of service of the procedure

list.name: ClaimLineItems
list.documentation: Use this collection to specify the list of clinical events and diagnoses performed by each Provider.

idsDocument.name: PayerClaimLineItem
idsDocument.elementOrder: ClaimLineItemId, OtherClaimLineItemId, Member, PayerClient, PlaceOfService, PlaceOfServiceCode, TypeCode, ServiceLine, ServiceLineCode, AlternateServiceLineCode, Procedure, CPT4ProcedureCode, CDTProcedureCode, HCPCSProcedureCode, ICD9DecimalProcedureCode, ICD9NonDecimalProcedureCode, ICD10PCSProcedureCode, SNOMEDCTProcedureCode, OtherProcedureCodes, ProcedureModifierCodes, ServicingProvider, Financial, LineOfBusinessCode, UnitOfMeasureCode, COBTypeCode, BilledQuantity, AllowedQuantity, CapitatedServiceIndicator, AllocatedAmountIndicator, ServiceFromDate, ServiceThruDate, PaidDate, PaidAmount, PaidAllocatedAmount, AllowedAmount, AllowedAllocatedAmount, DeniedAmount, ChargeAmount, InterestAmount, COBPaidAmount, COBPaidAllocatedAmount, CopayAmount, CoinsuranceAmount, DeductibleAmount, RiskWithheldAmount, HRAPaidAmount, NetworkAccessFee, NetworkAdminFee, TotalDisallowedAmount, TotalDisallowedAllocatedAmount, TotalPatientLiabilityAmount, TotalDiscountAmount, TotalClaimExpenseAmount, TotalClaimExpenseAllocatedAmount, TotalMemberBenefitAmount, TotalMemberBenefitAllocatedAmount, NoncoveredAmount, NetworkSavingsAmount, NetworkSavingsAllocatedAmount, PrimaryDisallowedCode, PrimaryDisallowedDescription, PrimaryDeniedCode, PrimaryDeniedDescription, AllowedDays, AllowedAnesthesiaMinutes, DrugCode, DrugRxNormCode, DrugNDCCode, DrugSNOMEDCTCode, DrugOtherCode, DrugDescription, EmergencyIndicator, ClaimLineItemDiagnoses, ClaimLineItemRx

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: OmniStatus, OmniStatusReason, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsDocument.documentation: This represents the line item level for a claim for coverage of specific procedures associated with medical service in the context of hospital services, medical office visits and professional services, prescriptions, dental and vision care.

element.name: SourceName
element.documentation: This element must identify the source system that was responsible for generating this data. This value is determined by the integration team and used in combination with SourceInstanceId will allow this record to be traced back to its originating source.

element.name: SourceInstanceId
element.documentation: This element must contain an integration manufactured value that uniquely identifies the collection element and can be used to map back to the source system. Whatever value is manufactured must not change over time as it will be used to make updates when data changes in the source system.

element.name: ClaimLineItemId
element.documentation: Unique ID for this claim line item

element.name: OtherClaimLineItemId
element.documentation: Alternative claim line item identifier for use in additional integration scenarios.

element.name: Member
element.documentation: Use this element to link this claim to the Member that received health care services.

element.name: PayerClient
element.documentation: Use this element to link this claim to the client, which represents the payer customer under which the member belongs

element.name: PlaceOfService
element.documentation: Link to an record representing an actual Facility where the service took place, if available.

element.name: PlaceOfServiceCode
element.documentation: Code indicating the place of service type for this claim line item.

element.name: TypeCode
element.documentation: Code describing the type of claim.

element.name: ServiceLine
element.documentation: A link to an OrganizationalUnit representing the Service Line as part of an organizational/cost center grouping.

element.name: ServiceLineCode
element.documentation: A code representing the type of service, from a classification list of service categories

element.name: AlternateServiceLineCode
element.documentation: A code representing the type of service, from an alternative or additional classification list of service categories

element.name: Procedure
element.documentation: Link to a ProcedureEvent record. This would be populated in lieu of the subsequent fields if clinical events are being implemented in the environment.

element.name: CPT4ProcedureCode
element.documentation: Procedure code expressed as a CPT-4 code.

element.name: CDTProcedureCode
element.documentation: Procedure code expressed as a CDT code.

element.name: HCPCSProcedureCode
element.documentation: Procedure code expressed as a HCPCS code.

element.name: ICD9DecimalProcedureCode
element.documentation: Procedure code expressed as an ICD-9 code with decimal point.

element.name: ICD10PCSProcedureCode
element.documentation: Procedure code expressed as an ICD-10-PCS code.

element.name: ICD9NonDecimalProcedureCode
element.documentation: Procedure code expressed as an ICD-9 code without a decimal point.

element.name: ICD10ProcedureCode
element.documentation: Procedure code expressed as an ICD-10-PCS code.

element.name: SNOMEDCTProcedureCode
element.documentation: Procedure code expressed as a SNOMED code.

element.name: OtherProcedureCodes
element.documentation: Procedure code expressed in a custom or proprietary code set.

element.name: ProcedureModifierCodes
element.documentation: Procedure Modifier Codes

element.name: ServicingProvider
element.documentation: Link to the Provider record representing the provider who performed the service.

group.name: Financial
group.elementOrder: NetworkArrangementCode, RateCode, ProductTypeCode, BillingComponentItemCode, ArrangementTypeCode, RevenueCode
group.documentation: Financial codes associated with the claim line item

element.name: NetworkArrangementCode
element.documentation: Code representing the line of business financial network arrangement

element.name: RateCode
element.documentation: Code representing the financial rate applied to the claim line item.

element.name: ProductTypeCode
element.documentation: Code representing the type of product for the claim line item.

element.name: BillingComponentItemCode
element.documentation: Code representing the item billing component code.

element.name: ArrangementTypeCode
element.documentation: Code representing the financial arrangement code.

element.name: RevenueCode
element.documentation: Code representing a revenue center, line of business or other business unit.

element.name: LineOfBusinessCode
element.documentation: Code representing the line of business. This could represent PPPO, HMO, etc.

element.name: UnitOfMeasureCode
element.documentation: Represents the unit of measure to be used with the result value.

element.name: COBTypeCode
element.documentation: Code describing the type of coordination of benefits in effect, if any.

element.name: BilledQuantity
element.documentation: A quantity representing the number of billed units of service for the associated procedure code. This could represent minutes, vists, sutures, etc.

element.name: AllowedQuantity
element.documentation: A quantity representing the number of allowable units for the line item. For pharmacy claims, this can capture the dispensed or filled quantity.

element.name: CapitatedServiceIndicator
element.documentation: Indicated whether this line item represents a capitation claim.

element.name: AllocatedAmountIndicator
element.documentation: Indicates if this line item represents an allocated amount from a higher level or 'bundled' service

element.name: ServiceFromDate
element.documentation: The calendar date that a specific claim service was performed or administered. For prescription claims, this is the date the prescription was filled.

element.name: ServiceThruDate
element.documentation: Use this element to define the ending service date and time for this procedure.

element.name: PaidDate
element.documentation: Use this element to define the ending service date and time for this procedure.

element.name: PaidAmount
element.documentation: The amount paid for this claim line item.

element.name: PaidAllocatedAmount
element.documentation: The allocated amount paid for this claim line item.

element.name: AllowedAmount
element.documentation: The total allowable amount for this line item.

element.name: AllowedAllocatedAmount
element.documentation: The total allowable allocated amount for this line item.

element.name: DeniedAmount
element.documentation: The amount denied for this claim line item.

element.name: ChargeAmount
element.documentation: The line item charge amount for the service(s).

element.name: InterestAmount
element.documentation: The amount of money associated with the payment of interest for the claim due to not being processed within the time limit established.

element.name: COBPaidAmount
element.documentation: The other carrier paid amount applied towards the line-item.

element.name: COBPaidAllocatedAmount
element.documentation: The other carrier paid allocated amount applied towards the line-item.

element.name: CopayAmount
element.documentation: The line item copayment amount.

element.name: CoinsuranceAmount
element.documentation: The line item coinsurance amount.

element.name: DeductibleAmount
element.documentation: The line item deductible amount.

element.name: RiskWithheldAmount
element.documentation: The line item risk withheld amount.

element.name: HRAPaidAmount
element.documentation: Represents the paid amount for the HRA line item

element.name: NetworkAccessFee
element.documentation: Network access fee charged for exchange of data between associated networks of payers.

element.name: NetworkAdminFee
element.documentation: Network administrative fee charged for exchange of data between associated networks of payers.

element.name: TotalDisallowedAmount
element.documentation: The total of all disallowed amounts for the line item.

element.name: TotalPatientLiabilityAmount
element.documentation: Represents the Total Patient Liability amount including deductibles, copay, coinsurance and disallow reimbursable for HRA processing coming from the extension

element.name: TotalDisallowedAllocatedAmount
element.documentation: The total of all disallowed allocated amounts for the line item.

element.name: TotalPatientLiabilityAmount
element.documentation: Represents the Total Patient Liability amount including deductibles, copay, coinsurance and disallow reimbursable for HRA processing coming from the extension

element.name: TotalDiscountAmount
element.documentation: The total of all discounts taken on the line item.

element.name: TotalClaimExpenseAmount
element.documentation: The total claims expense for a line item on a claim as calculated from direct expenses, fees, discounts, etc.

element.name: TotalClaimExpenseAllocatedAmount
element.documentation: The total claims allocated expense for a line item on a claim as calculated from direct expenses, fees, discounts, etc.

element.name: TotalMemberBenefitAmount
element.documentation: Total member benefits paid. May only be different from paid amount when this is a capitation claim.

element.name: TotalMemberBenefitAllocatedAmount
element.documentation: Total allocated member benefits paid. May only be different from paid amount when this is a capitation claim.

element.name: NoncoveredAmount
element.documentation: The amount of the denied line item charge that is the patients responsibility for payment because of non-compliance with coverage instructions or lack of coverage for those services.

element.name: NetworkSavingsAmount
element.documentation: The line item network savings amount.

element.name: NetworkSavingsAllocatedAmount
element.documentation: The line item network savings allocated amount.

element.name: PrimaryDisallowedCode
element.documentation: Code representing the primary reason for disallowing the claim.

element.name: PrimaryDisallowedDescription
element.documentation: Text describing the primary reason for disallowing the claim.

element.name: PrimaryDeniedCode
element.documentation: Code representing the primary reason for denying payment of the claim.

element.name: PrimaryDeniedDescription
element.documentation: Text describing the primary reason for denying payment of the claim.

element.name: AllowedDays
element.documentation: Allowed inpatient days for the claim line item. This would apply only to hospital/institutional claims.

element.name: AllowedAnesthesiaMinutes
element.documentation: Allowed anesthesia minutes for the claim line item. This would apply only to hospital/institutional claims.

element.name: DrugCode
element.documentation: Internal identifier representing a drug associated with a prescription claim.

element.name: DrugRxNormCode
element.documentation: RxNorm code representing a drug associated with a prescription claim.

element.name: DrugNDCCode
element.documentation: NDC code representing a drug associated with a prescription claim.

element.name: DrugSNOMEDCTCode
element.documentation: SNOMED-CT code representing a drug associated with a prescription claim.

element.name: DrugOtherCode
element.documentation: Code representing a drug associated with a prescription claim from a proprietary drug code system.

element.name: DrugDescription
element.documentation: Description/name of the prescribed drug.

element.name: EmergencyIndicator
element.documentation: Code indicating if this claim line item is associated with treatment in an emergency department.

list.name: ClaimLineItemDiagnoses
list.documentation: Use this collection to specify the diagnoses associated with the Claim Line Item.

idsDocument.name: PayerClaimLineItemDiagnosis
idsDocument.elementOrder: DiagnosisEvent, SequenceNbr, ICD9DecimalDiagnosisCode, ICD9NonDecimalDiagnosisCode, ICD10DiagnosisCode, SNOMEDCTDiagnosisCode, OtherDiagnosisCode, QualifierCode

include.name: CommonElements
include.appendToElementOrder: OmniStatus, OmniStatusReason, SourceStatusCode, SourceCreatedDate, SourceCreatedBy, SourceModifiedDate, SourceModifiedBy

idsDocument.documentation: Diagnosis associated with the claim line item

element.name: SourceName
element.documentation: This element must identify the source system that was responsible for generating this data. This value is determined by the integration team and used in combination with SourceInstanceId will allow this record to be traced back to its originating source.

element.name: SourceInstanceId
element.documentation: This element must contain an integration manufactured value that uniquely identifies the collection element and can be used to map back to the source system. Whatever value is manufactured must not change over time as it will be used to make updates when data changes in the source system.

element.name: DiagnosisEvent
element.documentation: Link to a DiagnosisEvent record. This would be populated in lieu of the subsequent fields if clinical events are being implemented in the environment.

element.name: SequenceNbr
element.documentation: Sequence number which indicates order of importance and (primary/secondary) as well as uniquely identifying it within the collection.

element.name: ICD9DecimalDiagnosisCode
element.documentation: Diagnosis code expressed as an ICD-9 code with decimal point.

element.name: ICD9NonDecimalDiagnosisCode
element.documentation: Diagnosis code expressed as an ICD-9 code without a decimal point..

element.name: ICD10DiagnosisCode
element.documentation: Diagnosis code expressed as an ICD-10 code.

element.name: SNOMEDCTDiagnosisCode
element.documentation: Diagnosis code expressed as a SNOMED CT code.

element.name: OtherDiagnosisCode
element.documentation: Diagnosis code expressed in a coding system that is proprietary to the implementation environment.

element.name: QualifierCode
element.documentation: Code representing a qualifier of the diagnosis code

group.name: ClaimLineItemRx
group.elementOrder: PrescribingProvider, PrescribingPractice, DispenseAsWrittenCode, PharmacyDispenseFee, FormularyStatusCode, FormularyTierCode, MatchLevelCode, MaxAllowableCost, MultiSourceCode, CompoundSpecifiedIndicator, MailOrderIndicator, PharmacyRxId, PrescriptionWrittenDate, FilledSupplyDays, SubmittedSupplyDays, FilledToSubmittedRatio, ProcessingFee, CopayBasisCode, CopayDifferenceAmount, SubmittedSupplyCost, PaidAmount, OriginalCostAmount, PerformanceGenericFee, PrescriberNetworkId, SalesTaxAmount, WholesaleUnitPrice
group.documentation: Represents an Observation result represented as a ratio.

element.name: PrescribingProvider
element.documentation: Link to the Provider record representing the provider who wrote the prescription.

element.name: PrescribingPractice
element.documentation: Link to the Organization record representing the practice which wrote the prescription.

element.name: DispenseAsWrittenCode
element.documentation: Code representing how the drug was actually dispensed in relation to how the prescription was written.

element.name: PharmacyDispenseFee
element.documentation: Fee paid to the pharmacy for dispensing the drug.

element.name: FormularyStatusCode
element.documentation: Indicates the Formulary status of the Drug.

element.name: FormularyTierCode
element.documentation: A code that uniquely identifies a formulary tier.

element.name: MatchLevelCode
element.documentation: Code representing the match level of the drug code during transaction processing.

element.name: MaxAllowableCost
element.documentation: Contains the portion of the dollar amount charged by the pharmacy that is allowed (eligible) for reimbursement

element.name: MultiSourceCode
element.documentation: A code indicating whether the drug dispensed is a single or multi-source drug.

element.name: CompoundSpecifiedIndicator
element.documentation: Code indicating whether or not the prescription is a compound.

element.name: MailOrderIndicator
element.documentation: A code indicating if the claim is for a mail-order transaction.

element.name: PharmacyRxId
element.documentation: The number of the prescription as assigned by the pharmacy at the time of fill.

element.name: PrescriptionWrittenDate
element.documentation: Date the prescription was written.

element.name: FilledSupplyDays
element.documentation: Pharmacy filled days supply. This is the supply actually filled.

element.name: SubmittedSupplyDays
element.documentation: Pharmacy submitted days supply. This is the supply requested on the original submitted prescription

element.name: FilledToSubmittedRatio
element.documentation: Ratio of the filled to submitted days supply.

element.name: ProcessingFee
element.documentation: The fee charged for processing each prescription claim.

element.name: CopayBasisCode
element.documentation: Code identifying how the reimbursement amount was calculated for copay.

element.name: CopayDifferenceAmount
element.documentation: Amount to be collected from the patient that is included in Patient Pay Amount that is due to the patient's selection of drug product

element.name: SubmittedSupplyCost
element.documentation: The submitted ingredient cost based on quantity dispensed times unit cost.

element.name: PaidAmount
element.documentation: The portion that is paid of the amount billed by the pharmacy for the cost of the drug dispensed.

element.name: OriginalCostAmount
element.documentation: Original ingredient cost of the drug dispensed by the pharmacy.

element.name: PerformanceGenericFee
element.documentation: Fee for Performance generic suggestion generation

element.name: PrescriberNetworkId
element.documentation: Prescriber Network Identification string

element.name: SalesTaxAmount
element.documentation: The amount of sales tax applicable for this claim.

element.name: WholesaleUnitPrice
element.documentation: Average Wholesale Price per unit for the drug as defined by processor.
